author: mjohanm4
content: Hey all, my name is Matt and I hope to learn from this group and to work hard to contribute to research. Been in public equities investment research for years, but I want to learn the intricacies behind the EVM, L2, and Eth2. You all made a revolutionary product that will change many markets for the better and that pushed me down the rabbit hole. I have a basic understanding, but infinite room to learn. Thank you all
